title: Bonus episode! Exhibiting Fashion: an Interview with Fashion Conservator Sarah Scaturro, part II
itunes:title: Bonus episode! Exhibiting Fashion: an Interview with Fashion Conservator Sarah Scaturro, part II
description:
In this week's bonus episode, we continue our conversation with Sarah Scaturro, head conservator at the Costume Institute at the Metropolitan Museum of Art. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
